full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` MGON PO TRAKSHAD 'KHOR BCAS DRAG TU BSKUL BRNGAMS PA'I SGRA DBYANGS DANG 'DI NYID KYI MNGA' GSOL BCAS BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B (CES PA 'DI YANG BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I BDAG PO LHAR BCAS 'GRO BA'I SKYABS MGON @014A *, ,MTSUNGS ZLA MA MCHIS PA, ^RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I YONGS 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD PA'I MGON PO TRAKSHAD KYI GTOR CHOG GI KHA SKONG LTA BUR, BSKUL BA DANG MNGA' GSOL BCAS 'DI DGOS ZHES, CHAB SHOG GI LAM NAS BSKUL MA GNANG BA KUS BAS NOD DE, KHYAD PA DGA' KHOR LO'I MGON PO RJE DZNY'A NA'I MTSAN CAN SOGS DAM PA DU MA'I BKA' DRIN LAS MGON PO 'DI NYID KYI RJES GNANG SGRUB THABS KYI LUNG SOGS KUN MKHYEN T'A RA NA THA'I YIG CHA LTAR THOB PA'I, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RIGS PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS RANG GI BSAM GTAN GYI KHANG BUR SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, YE SHES MGON POS 'PHRIN LAS GA-YEL MED MDZAD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG ,
